title.narrative: Consultant for Country Strategy Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning (MEL) system
Consultant for Country Strategy Monitoring, Evaluation and Learning (MEL) system

description.narrative: Svenska ambassaden i Dhaka har genomfört ett avrop av stöd för att göra de förändringsteorier som tagits fram för var och ett av strategins stödområden mer uppföljnings- och utvärderingsbara samt för att öka lärandet. Dessutom avropades stöd i framtagandet av en uppföljnings- och utvärderingsplan.

The Development Cooperation Section at the Swedish Embassy in Dhaka is endeavoring to enhance the quality of its work with monitoring, evaluation and learning. This Assignment is part of the operationalisation of Sweden’s Development Cooperation Strategy with Bangladesh 2021-2025, and concerns an evaluation-related service to support the Embassy revisit the ToCs developed during the initial strategy plan development to make them easier to monitor and evaluate. The consultant is expected to support the development of a robust structure for systematic use of evidence, evaluations, and other types of analysis. The purpose is to help Sida continuously assess progress, evaluate and learn in order to support strategic decision making throughout the strategy implementation. Therefore, in addition to supporting the refinement of the existing ToCs, support is also needed for the development of plans for monitoring, evaluation and learning. These plans shall be based on the refined ToCs and be synchronized with Sida’s reporting cycle.

participating-org.narrative: Sida administrative activity implemented by procured partner

tag.narrative: 1.4 - By 2030, ensure that all men and women, in particular the poor and the vulnerable, have equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to basic services, ownership and control over land and other forms of property, inheritance, natural resources, appropriate new technology and financial services, including microfinance.

1.4 - Senast 2030 säkerställa att alla män och kvinnor, i synnerhet de fattiga och de utsatta, har lika rätt till ekonomiska resurser, tillgång till grundläggande tjänster, möjlighet att äga och kontrollera mark och andra former av egendom samt tillgång till arv, naturresurser, lämplig ny teknik och finansiella tjänster, inklusive mikrokrediter.

1.5 - By 2030, build the resilience of the poor and those in vulnerable situations and reduce their exposure and vulnerability to climate-related extreme events and other economic, social and environmental shocks and disasters.

1.5 - Till 2030 bygga upp motståndskraften hos de fattiga och människor i utsatta situationer och minska deras utsatthet och sårbarhet för extrema klimatrelaterade händelser och andra ekonomiska, sociala och miljömässiga chocker och katastrofer.
